translated: The Jātaka🔽The Group of Discourses🔽The Chapter on the Thicket
The Jātaka of Upasāḷaka🔽“There are fourteen thousand
there is nothing immortal in the world.
Where there is truth and righteousness,
the noble ones resort to that,
that is immortal in the world.”
The Jātaka of Upasāḷaka is the sixth.
